title: Dating Darwinism, Referendums FTW?  08.12.22
itunes:title: Dating Darwinism, Referendums FTW?  08.12.22
description:
In episode 1308, Miles and guest co-host DJ Danl Goodman are joined by both the founders of The Mash-Up Americans and creators of Love and Noraebang, Amy S. Choi and Becca Lehrer, to discuss... Can Referendums Help Save Us? THE REPUBLICAN DATING APP REFUSES TO DIE and more!

  1. THE REPUBLICAN DATING APP REFUSES TO DIE

LISTEN: I Feel Like I'm Blue by Léa Sen

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
